original_title: Use of controversial anaesthetic drugs halted
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Health said the use of the two anaesthetic drugs, which caused many issues, was halted.
Additional Health Secretary Dr. Saman Ratnayake said measures have been taken to import another anaesthetic drug instead.
He said the stock of medicines will arrive in Sri Lanka on Thursday (13).
Health authorities directed attention towards the issue following the death of several women who underwent surgery using the relevant anaesthetic drugs.
